Module count
Package count.model

Class DirectEM

java.lang.Object
count.model.ML
count.model.DirectEM
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLDParameters
public class DirectEM
extends ML
implements GLDParameters
Expectation-maximization algorithm using ancestor copies, using DirectLikelihood.

    • addCells

      private static double[] addCells​(double[] a, double[] b, double bmul)
      Adds b to a, cell by cell, reusing a and/or b if possible. If a is null, then b is returned.
      Parameters:
      a - expanded if necessary to match length of b
      b - untouched
      Returns:
      cell-by-cell sums in array a (or b if a is null), or the resized version of a

    • fitParsimonyPenalty

      private double[] fitParsimonyPenalty​(double[][] trans)
      Parsimony penalties for Parsimony.setPenalties(double, double, double) calculated by fitting to log-odds scores from the argument.
      Parameters:
      trans - n-to-m transition counts (from getTransitionCounts())
      Returns:
      [gain, loss/death, dup]
